【Type C Rechargeable Wireless Mouse】This seenda wireless mouse uses 650mAh rechargeable battery and a single charge would last for a whole week. While the intelligent auto sleep function and on/off switch help you go further between charges

【Ultra Quiet Click】We know your demands of a quiet mouse, so we have reduced the clicking and scrolling noise to up to 90% while you enjoy the same click feel. Perfect for working at home, library, students dormitory,office or even traveling. Thanks to the great ergonomic design, this mouse fits comfortably in your hand, prevent any possible wrist pain

【Driver-Free &3 Adjustable DPI】Comes with a small USB nano receiver(stored in the back of mouse), just plug it into your computer and you are ready to go. 3 Adjustable DPI levels (800/1200/1600) ,set your own cursor speed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, smooth, and decent battery (Year 2 update)
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about buying this mouse since it has a rechargeable battery and lights on it. I was worried it would have terrible battery life, especially due to the lights. I was also worried about the size. My old Logitech mouse took a lot of abuse and still works great, but I wanted something different. Safe to say I love this mouse! It's big enough to fit in my hand but not huge. It's only about a quarter of an inch smaller than my Logitech. The battery lasts me about a week before I have to recharge, but it charges quickly. The lights are pretty and have many different patterns. The sleep mode is very useful and works well. I also love the DPI setting.By comparison, my old Logitech has no DPI setting, has rubber siding that collects oils and dead skin from my hand, and no sleep mode, though the rechargeable Energizer AA battery I used for it lasts several months before it needs changing.This mouse is smooth both in the hand and with its movements. The click is silent but satisfying. I also love that I don't have to have a AA battery for it to work. I haven't been able to get the wired connection to work, but maybe I misunderstood the description and this mouse doesn't have an option to be used with a cord. Nevertheless, it's a great mouse. My only recommendation is that if you value a longer battery life, maybe a 1 week battery (even though it's a rechargeable mouse) isn't the best option for you. But if a 1 week battery life is a good fit for you then you'll love this mouse!Update: 9/27/23Well, it finally happened. After almost exactly two years, I finally have to replace this mouse, but not because it doesn't work anymore. Surprisingly, the scroll wheel is what gave out. The lights still work, it still charges, and I still get a full week of battery on one charge. It has been dropped, tossed in bags, pushed off by my cats, and rattled around on the bottom of my backpack, but it still works perfectly except for the scroll wheel which now just rolls freely. Honestly, I was pretty rough on the scroll wheel so I'm not surprised. I definitely ordered a replacement, and I'm still keeping the old one just in case. Maybe I can get it repaired.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plug and Play...So Easy!
reviews.reviewText: I'm using this wireless mouse for an older Mac Book and it works so well! I don't use for gaming, but for all the other tasks and it works flawlessly. The lights are neat to look at! Easy to charge with USB cable and lets you know when it is fully charged. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect and Cute
reviews.reviewText: Got this mouse to reduce the wires, was not disappointed. I got the lavender color and it's such a nice shade. Love all the LED light mode options, and love that the mouse itself is rechargeable so I won't need batteries.Highly recommend this mouse!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good cute mouse
reviews.reviewText: Charges fast, works well. It's a good size. Has lots of color options for the LEDs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Recharging not always convenient
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice mouse. It is comfortable, works well and the line of colored lights are very pretty. This is the first time I've owned a mouse that needs to be charged. The mouse is not usable when charging making it inconvenient when I want to use my laptop and find the mouse dead. I've never been able to get the hang of the touchpad. Other than that one issue, I do love this mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a mouse
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for. Basic mouse. Nice lights. Get the job done. Well worth the low cost

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product
reviews.reviewText: I really like this mouse, it is smooth and I regularly use it on various different surfaces without much trouble. I take it with me and my laptop for work as well as my work desktop. I also purchased 2 more, another for my home and for my son to use at school. It is very quite and tactile so it is enjoyable to click.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So far so good, no complaints. Hardly need to charge them and no clicking sound, I think. I got them for my boys for school, but they seem to like them and they are super picky. They look nice and like the changing colors. Easy to use and good size.
